𒌢 UMBIN 𓋁 𓃀 𓌟 𓄹 𓏤 (finger/toe-)nail; claw; hoof; finger, toe 𒌢𒊺𒁀 umbin-še-ba ^^ 𒌢𒋛 umbin-si 𓂝 𓈖 𓏏 𓂷 •umnta ὄνυξ ónux 𒌢𒄊 claw

𒌢 ṣuprum zipóren
